website_summaries.verdict: A compact, affordable, and reliable model that can be affixed to your phone without too much bulk.
pros: Connection range is up to 150 ft. in an open area and 90 ft. indoors
Device doubles as remote shutter for selfies
Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant
Crowd-find app is helpful and easy to use
cons: It could get complicated if you invest in multiple finders and don’t pair them correctly to your device

customer_reviews.title: A really good gift!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the key finder and gifted my dad who has the habit of misplacing his keys and phone. He used the phone to find the car keys and was really excited to tell me about it. He is happy with it and it feels good to get him excited like this. Looking for more such electronic products that I could gift him. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NIKHIL JAIN

customer_reviews.title: Battery Contacts broke and too many false alarms
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 trackers (one for me and the other for my wife). My wife's tracker had a broken battery contact when it stopped working after a few days of working. Mine had too many false alarms even though I set the alarm in the least sensitive mode.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Scarfone

customer_reviews.title: Not working!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days continually beeped. Now does not show as connected. Have taken battery out, reinstalled app. Just ordered another Tile.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Harter

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable and range is minimal
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this to find things but I constantly get notifications that it is out of range or offline when its right next to me. I wish it would not go offline and not show last location. It needs a lot of debugging and wish it could have software updates... Pros it may beep sometimes to find if you are within range and it feels like it wants to be found. The app also DEMANDS you have location services on all the time (so your phone battery may drain) and have to send you notifications, albeit these are something unrelated about the finders location or something relatively important. Keep trying I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Rohnny Joyer

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Only have had the need to use it once. But it worked like a charm
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: the original worked for about 5 minutes - the replacement a bit longer, no apology for defective product, very slow on replacing item - don't waste your money on this poorly QA/QC'd product
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: waste
customer_reviews.text: This is such a waste. Spend good money on one that works better. The app Smart Finder is NOT smart. It will alert the app on my phone after an hour of me being separated from my keys or the reverse as well. It has worked properly maybe two or three times when I'm looking for my keys or for my phone from the tile or the app. I have even replaced the battery and that did not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Coray

customer_reviews.title: Great Tile alternative with replaceable battery
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Tile with this because the battery died. I use it to find my dog if he escapes the yard. The app works and I really appreciate the replaceable battery!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Great  tracker
customer_reviews.text: A gift from my friend, I love it. Easy to set up and useful, but sometime it's too sencetive till I update the app. I find out some intresting ferture sunch as share with other friend or be a luggage tracker, selfie remotor.....
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Copper

customer_reviews.title: Beeping madness
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my boyfriend because he always misplaced his keys. Unfortunately, it randomly beeps all the time. I wanted something that would beep when he was looking for his keys, not something that would randomly start beeping at work, at the movies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Key Finder Locator Smart Anti-Lost Tracker,For Key,Wallet,Bag,Luggage,Phone,with App Control and Smart Anti Lost Alarm
feature_bullets: Two Way Tracking : Use your phone with easy-to-use app to track the item by the ring mode(set in app) from the attached key finder when the item is out of range and disconnected.Also ring and find your cell phone by simply pressing round button on the Key Finder

Tips:Ensure the APP SwiftFinder is always alive,can't be shut down by the phone system.If the APP is closed, the key finder will be disconnected with the APP,or the key finder will be disconnected with the APP and it may go off randomly. If you use the Android system,you can set up the "Battery Management" in the "Settings" of the system,make sure the APP SwiftFinder AUTO RUN,and can always work to protect your stuffs. iOS system is fine, you don't need to set up.

Smart Tracker and Share Function:APP will help find with location map to speculate approximate location of your missing item. It records the last place the give you signal guiding you to lost item.And only one phone can use it at the same time. It will display the location on the map. You can also share the device to others. Use TOKSAM SwiftFinder as a remote control and take photo.Create your own ringtones to meet your taste.

Long battery life and Connection range: Long Swiftfinder key finder battery life, and CR2032 battery can be replaced by user as needed. Swift Finder ST02 offers Bluetooth Range up to more than 30-50m in open area outside and 10-30m in indoor distance. Accuracy is affected by various factors including physiology, location of device.
Support siri, Google assistant and Amazon Alexa, works on Apple iOS 9.0+ and Android 6+ , Bluetooth 6+ or BLE. Can share with your friend, family, but only one can connected at same time.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
